scripts.check:all: npm run install:all && npm run lint:client && npm run test:all && npm run build:client
scripts.install:all: npm run create:venv && npm run install:forge && npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.test:all: npm run test:client && npm run acceptance:run && npm run test:server
scripts.freeze:all: npm run freeze:forge && npm run freeze:server
scripts.test:server: cd server && . .venv/bin/activate && python3 -m unittest discover -s src -p '*Test.py' && deactivate
scripts.create:venv: cd server && rm -rf .venv && python3 -m venv .venv && cd ../forge && rm -rf .venv && python3 -m venv .venv
scripts.install:server: cd server && . .venv/bin/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && deactivate
scripts.install:forge: cd forge && . .venv/bin/activate && pip3 install -r requirements.txt && deactivate
scripts.install:client: cd client && npm install && cd ../acceptance && npm install
scripts.freeze:server: cd server && . .venv/bin/activate && pip3 freeze > requirements.txt && deactivate
scripts.freeze:forge: cd forge && . .venv/bin/activate && pip3 freeze > requirements.txt && deactivate
